data.title: Bibliograph
data.meta_description: An open data platform that grows library visibility through a collaboration of thousands of libraries and their service providers. Our mission is to build new pathways to libraries on the Web. Together, we share structured data and connect people with the books they want to read.
data.text:
Summary

In present day London dragons awake. Fast forward 20 years, to a world devastated by their destruction. Fire Chief Quinn, is responsible for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive in what's left of the world. Into their midst comes a hotshot American, Van Zan, who says he has a way to destroy the beasts and save mankind
